name: sentence-case
readme:
# sentence-case

Sentence case a string.

## Installation

```bash
npm install sentence-case --save
```

## Usage

```javascript
var sentenceCase = require('sentence-case');

sentenceCase('string');    //=> "string"
sentenceCase('dot.case');  //=> "dot case"
sentenceCase('camelCase'); //=> "camel case"
```
